statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeeTrainingProgress WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT training_id, progress_percentage FROM EmployeeTrainingProgress WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTrainingProgress WHERE completion_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, training_id, progress_percentage FROM EmployeeTrainingProgress ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTrainingProgress WHERE employee_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTrainingProgress WHERE progress_percentage > 50 ORDER BY completion_date DESC
SELECT employee_id, training_id, completion_date FROM EmployeeTrainingProgress WHERE employee_id = 100 ORDER BY training_id ASC, completion_date DESC
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id FROM EmployeeTrainingProgress WHERE progress_percentage < 25 ORDER BY employee_id ASC
SELECT employee_id, SUM(progress_percentage) AS total_progress FROM EmployeeTrainingProgress GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_progress > 100 ORDER BY total_progress DESC
SELECT * FROM EmployeeTrainingProgress WHERE completion_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, training_module, progress_percentage FROM EmployeeProgress WHERE progress_percentage > 50
SELECT * FROM TrainingModules WHERE difficulty_level = 'Intermediate'
SELECT module_name, total_duration_hours FROM TrainingModules ORDER BY total_duration_hours DESC
SELECT employee_name, progress_percentage FROM EmployeeProgress WHERE training_module = 'SQL Basics'
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM EmployeeProgress WHERE progress_percentage < 25
SELECT employee_name, progress_percentage FROM EmployeeProgress WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT employee_name, training_module FROM EmployeeProgress WHERE training_module LIKE '%SQL%';
SELECT employee_name, module_name, total_duration_hours FROM EmployeeProgress INNER JOIN TrainingModules ON EmployeeProgress.training_module = TrainingModules.module_name;
SELECT * FROM EmployeeProgress ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC;
SELECT employee_name, progress_percentage FROM EmployeeProgress WHERE progress_percentage < 30 ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_details WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee_details WHERE supervisor_id = 101;
SELECT employee_id, training_module FROM training_progress WHERE progress_percentage >= 80;
SELECT * FROM module_details WHERE module_id = 3;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employee_details ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, department, supervisor_id FROM employee_details WHERE department='IT';
SELECT employee_name, department, supervisor_id FROM employee_details WHERE supervisor_id IS NULL;
SELECT employee_name, training_module, progress_percentage FROM training_progress WHERE progress_percentage > 50;
SELECT employee_name, department, supervisor_id FROM employee_details ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT module_name, module_description FROM module_details WHERE module_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM employee;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee WHERE department='HR';
SELECT certification_name, completion_date FROM certification ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT training_name, duration FROM training WHERE duration > 5;
SELECT employee_name, job_title FROM employee WHERE job_title='Manager' LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM employee JOIN certification ON employee.employee_id = certification.employee_id
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employee WHERE job_title = 'Manager' ORDER BY department DESC
SELECT certification_name, completion_date FROM certification WHERE completion_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT training_name, duration FROM training WHERE training_type = 'Online' OR training_type = 'Workshop' ORDER BY duration ASC
SELECT employee_id, training_name, progress_status FROM progress WHERE progress_status = 'Completed'
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee WHERE manager_id = 100;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM TrainingProgram WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_id, completion_date FROM EmployeeTraining WHERE program_id = 5 ORDER BY completion_date DESC;
SELECT department_name, location FROM Department ORDER BY department_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Employee WHERE department = 'IT'
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM Employee ORDER BY hire_date DESC
SELECT * FROM TrainingProgram WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'

SELECT employee_name, program_name FROM Employee INNER JOIN EmployeeTraining ON Employee.employee_id = EmployeeTraining.employee_id INNER JOIN TrainingProgram ON EmployeeTraining.program_id = TrainingProgram.program_id WHERE Employee.department = 'HR'

SELECT department_name, COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees FROM Department LEFT JOIN Employee ON Department.department_id = Employee.department GROUP BY department_name ORDER BY total_employees DESC
